example.text: Since his first day in office, Biden has actively worked to implement radical open border policies that have resulted in the worst border crisis in American history!

Americans deserve an economy that is strong, communities that are safe, a future that is built on freedom and a government that is accountable to them. House Republicans have a concrete plan to accomplish those goals, but President Biden has to be willing to work with us.

2022 CONGRESSIONAL APP CHALLENGE WINNER Every year members of Congress host the Congressional App Challenge , giving students all over the nation the opportunity to demonstrate their computer science skills. I recently announced Ayushmaan Dubey as the TX-31 2022 Congressional App Challenge winner for his app, Rise and Shine , which connects students with tutors.

STATE OF THE UNION On Tuesday, President Biden gave his State of the Union address, taking a victory lap despite over 40% of Americans admitting that they're worse off under his leadership. He attempted to paint a picture of a thriving nation, but if he asked average Americans, he'd know that his leadership has left their families behind.
Since his first day in office, Biden has actively worked to implement radical open border policies that have resulted in the worst border crisis in American history!

This week, I was proud to join my colleagues in a bipartisan effort to create the Select Committee on the Chinese Communist Party. Communist China is a serious threat to the United States, and this committee will investigate solutions to issues from manufacturing to national security.
